description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-tomb-guardian.tomb-guardian.Item.CJOEtUeHnEkoZ6Lr]{Scion Stance}.

Requirements you are wielding a weapon with the Two-Hand trait or a weapon in both hands from either the Sword or Polearm group.

While wielding a weapon in both hands that is either a Sword or a Polearm, you count as having a free hand for the purposes of wielding a shield, including the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.m4HQ2o5aPxjXf2kY]{Shield Block} actions.

You may deploy a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.2RrKSkj27NDREOKQ]{Gauntlet Buckler} as part of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}, and that buckler folds back inside your gauntlet when not raised.

f (manipulate) As a free action while entering this stance, you may stow any number of items from your hands, then draw and equip a shield, weapon, change your grip, as long as any weapon meets the requirements of this stance.

You may @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain} this stance, allowing you to gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.657SMUB2N9VZOgYp]{Lightning Swap} action, provided that any weapons or shields you are stowing or drawing as part of that action are weapons for this stance.
